data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every one of the 20,009 ordinary believers here to care for others, like a shepherd cares for his sheep.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Chungcheongbuk-do, South Korea
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the state of Chungcheongbuk-do, South Korea.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.section_summary: On average, 9 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who are far from God in Chungcheongbuk-do, South Korea.
data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to these new families.
Spirit, train the church of Chungcheongbuk-do, South Korea to trust with all their hearts, and you will make their paths straight.
data.verse: Trust in Yahweh with all your heart, and don’t lean on your own understanding. In all your ways acknowledge him, and he will make your paths straight.

data.prayer: Jesus, please raise up evangelists to equip your people to share the gospel in Chungcheongbuk-do.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Oh Lord, show the fatherless in the state of Chungcheongbuk-do that you can be their real Father.
data.verse: I will be to you a Father. you will be to me sons and daughters,’ says the Lord Almighty.

data.prayer: Please, teach the 20,009 believers in Chungcheongbuk-do, South Korea how to pray to you and how to listen for your voice. That they might follow you into the good works you have prepared for them.
data.verse: My sheep listen to my voice; I know them, and they follow me.

data.section_summary:
the state of Chungcheongbuk-do, South Korea has a population of 122,300.

We estimate Chungcheongbuk-do has 20,009 people who might know Jesus, 16,806 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 85,486 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 6 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, let it be said of the 102,292 lost in Chungcheongbuk-do that you have called them out of darkness into your glorious light.
data.verse: But you are a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for God’s own possession, that you may proclaim the excellence of him who called you out of darkness into his marvelous light
